definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: And I know to watch the traffic lights carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我也知道要仔細觀看交通號誌。

sentences.english: Semaphore signals at north of Yu-Li Station.
sentences.chinese: 玉里站北的臂木式號誌機。

sentences.english: Departure semaphore signals. North of the Wan-Rong Station.
sentences.chinese: 萬榮站北的臂木式出發號誌機。

sentences.english: Semaphore signals at north of Shou-Feng Station.
sentences.chinese: 壽豐站北的臂木式出發號誌機。

sentences.english: Please make a right turn at the next light.
sentences.chinese: 請在下個交通號誌右轉。

sentences.english: A signal box and miniature semaphore signals at Keelung Station.
sentences.chinese: 基隆站內的號誌樓及小型臂木號誌機羣。

sentences.english: A signal box and miniature semaphore signals at Keelung Station.
sentences.chinese: 基隆站內的號誌樓及小型臂木號誌機羣。

sentences.english: Everybody should watch the traffic lights.
sentences.chinese: 每個人都應該遵守交通號誌。

sentences.english: The driver fell asleep while he was waiting for the traffic light to change.
sentences.chinese: 該駕駛在等候交通號誌燈轉換時睡著了。

sentences.english: Traffic signs are convenient; timely attention is the safest.
sentences.chinese: 交通號誌真方便，時時注意才安全。

sentences.english: A lot of people disregard traffic signals and rules.
sentences.chinese: 很多人疏忽於交通號誌和法則。

sentences.english: Arrival semaphore signals. North of the Wan-Rong Station.
sentences.chinese: 萬榮站北的臂木式進站號誌機。

sentences.english: What I found was the traffic signs on the Kaohsiung City streets.
sentences.chinese: 我找到的是高雄市街道上的交通號誌。

definition: (of police etc) to stop (sb) for inspection/to pull (sb) over
